Key Match Events: New Zealand won by 5 wickets (with 160 balls remaining)
Trent Boult is the Player of the Match
Pre-Game Insights: NZ have the best net run-rate among the teams, and if they win against SL, they will all but make the semis
SL are out of contention for the semis, but Champions Trophy qualification is at stake
Post-Match Reflections: Mathews has Mitchell holing out in what might have been his last World Cup game, but Phillips and Latham bring it home for NZ at the Chinnaswamy
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side
